    • Uses of AbstractKMeans in de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans

      Subclasses of AbstractKMeans in de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  KMeansLloyd<V extends NumberVector<V,?>,D extends Distance<D>>
      Provides the k-means algorithm, using Lloyd-style bulk iterations.
      class  KMeansMacQueen<V extends NumberVector<V,?>,D extends Distance<D>>
      Provides the k-means algorithm, using MacQueen style incremental updates.
      class  KMediansLloyd<V extends NumberVector<V,?>,D extends Distance<D>>
      Provides the k-medians clustering algorithm, using Lloyd-style bulk iterations.
